Text.Page:
You've been a big help thus far, . I'd like you to go deeper into Deva Silva and work with one of my scouts, {@LinkCreature:203#1011#Droyan}.

He's a good scout, but he could probably use some combat power like yours. Take the field, soldier!

Welcome to Devas R Us!

Good to see a friendly face! I've been watching these fiends for some time. There's work to be done, but I can't risk my position.

Up for a little fighting? How about a lot of it? Hah!
